doc.field: Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Young Communist League USA Archived Website
Young Communist League USA Archived Website

The Young Communist League, USA was a multi-racial, working-class organization made up youth. The organization's main goal is to educate members into becoming communists. They work to advocate for the working class, reject the abuse of drugs and alcohol, to fight for the equality of all young people, to end racism and discrimination, and work for peace, full employment, complete equality, trade union and democratic rights. The YCL was associated with the Communist Party of the United States of America. The website contains news listings, membership applications, and their publication Dynamic Magazine. The website was redesigned in 2013 and 2015.
